response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Our product offers unparalleled value and has been meticulously designed to meet your specific needs. I understand its significance to you, valued at $1,000,000, and I am confident it will exceed your expectations.

As the owner of this product, I am committed to achieving the highest possible return on my investment. Therefore, I am offering you the chance to purchase it at a special price of $1,200,000. This offer represents a strategic midpoint between the intrinsic value to you and the market value, allowing both parties to benefit.

Please consider this offer carefully. Should you decide to proceed, I am prepared to facilitate a smooth transaction. If you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out.

Looking forward to your positive response.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
